entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , North Cape
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 9:56 PM AST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: WIND WARNING ENDED, North Cape
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:08 AM AST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: 6.1°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: North Cape 04:00 AM AST Saturday 24 December 2022
Temperature: 6.1°C
Pressure / Tendency: 98.9 kPa falling
Humidity: 96 %
Dewpoint: 5.6°C
Wind: SE 28 km/h gust 62 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Saturday: Rain or snow. Temperature falling to minus 1 this afternoon.
entry.summary: Rain ending this morning then a mix of sun and cloud. 30 percent chance of flurries late this afternoon. Wind southeast 40 km/h gusting to 60 becoming southwest 40 gusting to 60 this morning. Temperature falling to minus 1 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday night: A few flurries. Low minus 3.
entry.summary: Flurries with risk of snow squalls. Amount 5 cm in the heaviest flurries. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 3. Wind chill minus 9 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High minus 2. POP 60%
